bibl.title: Places and Spaces in the Themistou Meris (Fayum / Graeco-Roman Egypt) Locating Settlements by Multidimensional Scaling of Papyri
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. Non-metric multidimensional scaling (MDS). - 3. Shape of data and matrix. - 4. Test results. - 5. Conclusion. - Appendix. Matrix and source.
bibl.seg: MUELLER Katja, Places and Spaces in the Themistou Meris (Fayum / Graeco-Roman Egypt). Locating Settlements by Multidimensional Scaling of Papyri.
